snippet.title: Brewers yet to make specific plan for Johnny Hellweg
snippet.description: Pittsburgh - Right-hander Johnny Hellweg, named the Pacific Coast League pitcher of the year on Wednesday, will make one more start for Class AAA Nashville before being recalled by the Brewers. Then what happens? "We've talked a little about it," said manager Ron Roenicke. "We have to

snippet.title: Former Milwaukee Braves great Johnny Logan dies at 86
snippet.description: Former Milwaukee Braves great Johnny Logan died Friday night at Clement J. Zablocki VA Medical Center at 86. Logan, who often paid visits to Miller Park and was there recently, was inducted in the Walk of Fame there last month. At the time, he was in failing
